means: 对（机密文件等）销密( declassify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: These reports were only declassified last year.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些报告去年才被撤销了密级。

sentence.Network_en: Thousands of classified documents have now been declassified.
sentence.Network_cn: 数以千计的保密文件现在被解密了.

sentence.Network_en: The software used for Siemens S 7 - 300 encryption logic block declassified.
sentence.Network_cn: 此软件用于对西门子S7 -300 加密逻辑块解密.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Britain considered attacking Tokyo with chemical weapons a year before the US nuclear bombing during WW2 , declassified records revealed .已公开的机密记录披露，二战期间，在美国使用原子弹的一年前，英国曾考虑对东京使用化学武器。
declassification 破解, declassified 解除保密的, declassification 降低密级
today that secrecy has outlived its use , according to CIA historian David Robarge , explaining why the crash photos have been declassified .今天，这个秘密已经失去它的使用价值，中情局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔表示，他还解释了为什么坠毁照片被解密的原因。

list.abs: declassified document的意思是: 解密文件相关短语:  declassified cost 重分类成本  declassified document 解密文件到沪江小D查看declassified document的更多详细.

in 2001 , the Pentagon declassified one element of this research Active Denial System , a weapon that uses electromagnetic radiation to heat skin and create an intense burning sensation .2001年，美国五角大楼解密了这一研究的一个要点，否认电磁辐射热造成皮肤灼热感或灼烧感的武器。

some recently declassified documents , however , have suggested there may have been a thirteenth member who eluded the salarian military .然而，一些最近解密的文件指出可能还有一位瞒过索拉瑞安军方的第十三号成员。

entry.tran: 撤销(秘密文件或档案)的密级;对…解密
entry.def: If secret documents or records are declassified, it is officially stated that they are no longer secret.

example.ex: These reports were only declassified last year.
example.tran: 这些报告去年才被撤销了密级。

auth_sentence.content: It is extremely hard to approach them even though they have been declassified.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is extremely hard to approach them even though they have been declassified.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is extremely hard to approach them even though they have been declassified.

auth_sentence.content: This is made from declassified Beaujolais grapes and it's a total charmer.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is made from declassified Beaujolais grapes and it's a total charmer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is made from declassified Beaujolais grapes and it's a total charmer.

auth_sentence.content: But the declassified information available covers only a small fraction of the Arctic Ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the declassified information available covers only a small fraction of the Arctic Ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the declassified information available covers only a small fraction of the Arctic Ocean.
